EmailTemplate.name: Honeywell Vision Systems.Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Honeywell Vision Systems Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero?rf=107633562593387> <http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Honeywell Vision Systems Webinar You're invited to participate in the Honeywell Aerospace Vision Systems webinar, hosted by Jeff Holt with Honeywell Flight Technical Services. The webinar agenda topics will include:
- Enhanced Vision Systems - Enhanced Flight Vision Systems - Synthetic Vision Systems
- Combined Vision Systems
- Operational credit that is being given to various systems - Future technologies and how they will benefit the aviation industry
For more information contact us at: FTS@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/kQ0mq0Z00xK02IGYX20p70X>
Click here <http://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/Honeywell Vision Systems.ics> to download the Outlook invitation complete with dial-in/login details.
This conference is scheduled for: 9:00 AM (Pacific Time) Thursday, October 30, 2014 for a duration of 30 minutes (12:00 PM Eastern, 11:00 AM Central, 10:00 AM Mountain)
Audience URL: http://event.on24.com/r.htm?e=865158&s=1&k=986D7DBAEF50C34C71E79ADE518D282E <http://event.on24.com/r.htm?e=865158&s=1&k=986D7DBAEF50C34C71E79ADE518D282E>

Event Title: Honeywell Vision Systems Webinar
